ayahs.text: yusab~iHu lil~ahi maA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wamaA fiY {lo>aroDi {lomaliki {loqud~uwsi {loEaziyzi {loHakiymi

qulo <in~a {lomawota {l~a*iY tafir~uwna minohu fa<in~ahu, mula`qiykumo vum~a turad~uwna <ilaY` Ea`limi {logayobi wa{l$~aha`dapi fayunab~i}ukum bimaA kuntumo taEomaluwna
ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ <i*aA nuwdiYa lilS~alaw`pi min yawomi {lojumuEapi fa{soEawoA@ <ilaY` *ikori {ll~ahi wa*aruwA@ {lobayoEa *a`likumo xayorN l~akumo <in kuntumo taEolamuwna
